channel.title: Error_game_invalidhost.ws - Shouldn't have this error, What have i done wrong?
channel.description:
Hi,
I have made a 562 web client, i jar'd it like i was ment to and i even edited the signlink.java, client.java and applet.java so everything should be working. I have had no problems with the compiler, the compiler says everything is coded correctly.
When i jar'd the client i also generated a batch file too and the batch file opens with no errors and then starts downloading the client but however i do not get this on my website, i get the error_game_invalidhost.ws.
This is what i get when i open the batch file: [img]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/55534911/3.png[/img]
and i get the same thing to when i open the jar file. The cache gets downloaded. After the cache is downloaded the client is stuck at "Connecting to server". But i have checked the client ip that its trying to connect to and it is correct and is also online.

item.title: Error_game_invalidhost.ws - Shouldn't have this error, What have i done wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

arham 4:

Use eclipse to jar it.

Use eclipse? where can i find this? Is there a tutorial on how to do it?

Read full topic
